name: Heist of the Century
description:
This is my submission to the GMTK 2021

You can play this solo but it's recommended to play it with another player, preferrably with a controller

You and another player are trying to steal diamonds from a museum.

In each level, one of the player will have to move around on the roof, and lower/raise the rope, while the other will have to climb down on the rope, grab the diamond and avoid various dangers.

Roof Player :

W/S to raise/lower the rope
A/D to move left/right

Other Player : 

Left Joystick on a controller or Left/Right arrows on the keyboard to move
A on a controller or Up arrow on the keyboard to hook/unhook from the end of the rope and to grab the diamond

I may add some more stuff before the end of the jam (and also after in a separate build)

Rain sound effects by InspectorJ on freesound

Music is Spy Piano by Serge Quadrado

Alarm sound by Onderwish on freesound
